## WorkspaceLeaf.openFile() method

By default, `openFile` will also make the leaf active. Pass in `{ active: false }` to override.

**Signature:**

```typescript
openFile(file: TFile, openState?: OpenViewState): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>file</code> | [`TFile`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/TFile.md) |  |
|  <code>openState</code> | [`OpenViewState`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/OpenViewState.md) | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

`Promise``<void>`
